resources.string:
15 puzzle

The number in the title game is set on the number of cells. Each cell is numbered. One of the cells is not occupied. The player can move the cells by the free cell. Goal of the game - moving the cells of the box to achieve the ordering of numbers in ascending order, it is desirable to making as little as possible moves. Cells moved by pressing.

by: Mr. Alex
Saving missing! Press a new game.

1) first chose the size of the board 2) there is no need to shuffle… we will do it for you. 3) you are ready. Play and injoy. Your goal is to move the puzzle parts to their place: the sequence you dicided to solve tip form us: if you are unhappy with the starting position, or made a mistake you can just shuffle again and start from the beginning. and remember not everything is possible.
